|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== *"GS1900-8HP" and "37ZY-1908PO+412 V1.2" are silkscreened on board.
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Co-processor: STMicro STM32F100C8 to manage PoE *Flash/RAM: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB RAM (DDR2) *8x Gigabit 802.3at Ethernet ports *70W PoE budget *16Gbps switching capacity
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_gs1900-8hp_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/gs1900-8hp_v1 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/support-for-rtl838x-based-managed-switches/57875 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = realtek |subtarget = rtl838x |arch = mips-4kec |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
